text: Bridelieae is a tribe of the family Phyllanthaceae. It comprises two genera: :Bridelia (also Candelabria, Gentilia, Pentameria, Tzellemtinia) :Cleistanthus (also Clistanthus, Godefroya, Kaluhaburunghos, Lebidiera, Lebidieropsis, Leiopyxis, Nanopetalum, Neogoetzia, Paracleisthus, Schistostigma, Stenonia, Stenoniella, Zenkerodendron) ==See also== * Taxonomy of the Phyllanthaceae ==References== Category:Phyllanthaceae Category:Malpighiales tribes
title: Bridelieae
